edge: Sandra Bullock starred in the movie 'All About Steve'.
Fox 2000 Pictures acquired the Kim Barker penned spec script 'All About Steve' to be developed as a starring vehicle for Sandra Bullock.
The movie 'All About Steve' was released on September 4, 2009.
Bradley Cooper co-starred with Sandra Bullock in the movie 'All About Steve'.
Scenes featuring the collapsed mine and sink hole were filmed at The Walt Disney Company's Golden Oak Ranch near Santa Clarita, California.
Production of the movie 'All About Steve' began in July 2007.
